Sederet Dampak Buruk Anak Terlalu Banyak Nonton TV
06 Nov 2019, 11:50 by Tempo.co, Yayuk Widiyarti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Anak-anak sekarang banyak menghabiskan waktu di depan televisi, selain gawai. Jika anak Anda termasuk, sebaiknya mulailah dibatasi.
The American Academy of Pediatrics melarang penggunaan media pada anak di bawah usia 2 tahun. Lembaga ini juga merekomendasikan agar membatasi waktu menonton tidak lebih dari 1-2 jam sehari.
Terlalu banyak menonton televisi dapat menimbulkan dampak bagi kesehatan maupun kemampuan anak. Berikut beberapa dampak jika anak terlalu banyak menghabiskan waktu di depan televisi, dilansir dari Mayo Clinic.
#Obesitas Semakin banyak anak menghabiskan waktu di depan televisi semakin besar pula risiko terkena obesitas. Terlebih jika kamar anak terpasang pesawat televisi. Anak-anak menjadi target konsumtif iklan makanan cepat saji.
#Kurang tidur Anak yang sering menonton televisi memiliki risiko lebih besar mengalami kesulitan tidur atau memiliki jadwal tidur yang tidak teratur. Jika anak kurang tidur, mudah lelah dan meningkatkan keinginan untuk mengonsumsi makanan ringan atau ngemil.
#Masalah perilaku Anak usia sekolah yang menghabiskan waktu lebih dari 2 jam sehari untuk menonton televisi atau menggunakan komputer cenderung memiliki masalah emosional, sosial, dan perhatian. Menonton televisi secara berlebihan pada usia 4 tahun dapat terkena perundungan di usia 6 sampai 11.
#Prestasi akademik menurun Anak usia sekolah yang memiliki televisi di kamar tidur cenderung mendapatkan nilai yang buruk dibanding anak yang tidak tidak ada televisi di kamar tidurnya.
#Kekerasan Anak yang terpapar berita kekerasan melalui televisi dapat terpengaruh berbuat kekerasan. Akibatnya, anak belajar memecahkan masalah dengan kekerasan.
#Mengurangi daya kreativitas Banyak menghabiskan waktu di depan TV membuat waktu anak untuk aktif bermain sedikit, padahal dengan bermain daya kreativitasnya terasah.

Series of Bad Impacts of Children Watching Too Much TV
Nov 6, 2019, 11:50 by Tempo.co, Yayuk Widiyarti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Children now spend a lot of time in front of the television, besides gadgets. If your child is included, you should start to be limited.
The American Academy of Pediatrics prohibits the use of media in children under 2 years of age. The agency also recommends limiting watching time to no more than 1-2 hours a day.
Watching too much television can have an impact on children's health and abilities. Here are some of the effects if a child spends too much time in front of television, as reported by the Mayo Clinic.
#Obesitas The more children spend time in front of the television the greater the risk of obesity. Especially if the child's room is attached to a television set. Children are targeted for consumption of fast food advertisements.
Sleep deprivation Children who often watch television have a greater risk of having trouble sleeping or having an irregular sleep schedule. If the child lacks sleep, gets tired easily and increases the desire to eat snacks or snack.
# Behavioral problems School-age children who spend more than 2 hours a day watching television or using computers tend to have emotional, social, and attention problems. Watching television excessively at the age of 4 years can be exposed to harassment at ages 6 to 11.
#Academic achievement decreases School-age children who have a television in the bedroom tend to get poor grades compared to children who do not have a television in their bedroom.
# Violence Children exposed to news of violence through television can be affected by violence. As a result, children learn to solve problems with violence.
# Reducing the power of creativity A lot of time spent in front of the TV makes the child's time to actively play a little, even though by playing his creativity is honed.
